short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows flash to be enabled automatically on New Club Penguin!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Turn your Chrome Browser into the ultimate NewCP-playing application. 

This lightweight utility is completely free to use. Simply install our extension to ensure Flash is always enabled while waddling.
